analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo
analyzed: kusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ
ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo
analyzed: akusalam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ
ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo ca naakusalo naanārammaṇo
analyzed: abyākatam anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na anārammaṇaḥ
